Anime Recommendation of the Month: The Promised Neverland 📽️📺This anime will remind you of the intellectual struggle between Light and L from Death Note – this show covers a covert and ever present battle of logic, strategy and creativity between the threats and our little baby geniuses. You will constantly find yourself on a roller-coaster of emotions. If there was a scale range from cute to terrifying, this anime would cover the whole thing. You will find yourself thinking about the plight of the baby geniuses during the week while waiting for the next episode (Season 2 is on air!!) – exploring ideas for yourself of how you would survive and what clues or conclusions could be made next. Furthermore the concept/story is amazing, beautifully animated and carefully directed with some great characters. Totally worth a watch! ⭐#ThePageTurnerSociety #JIIT #PTS #Anime #AnimeLove #animeforever #ThePromisedNeverland #Thriller #Suspense #MustWatch #bingewatching #animefans

Series recommendations of the month: True Detective 📽️📺As the name suggests True Detective is a story that revolves around brilliant US Detectives who with their sheer will power and courage, try to solve mysterious murder cases which have the potential to endanger many innocent lives. From a small town serial killer to a metropolitan drug Lord assassination this series delivers to you the perfect dose of crime and never ending suspense. How these police detectives, work their minds off in order to collect all the pieces of the puzzle is just a treat to watch. With its out of the world storyline, engrossing action sequences, raw acting and brilliant cinematography this series is a luxury destination for binge watchers. Overall true detective provides a perfect escape from your boring, monotonous reality and you get to live an adventurous life full of thrill and enigma.#ThePageTurnerSociety #JIIT #PTS #webseries #series #truedetective #truedetectives #truedetectivequotes #Thriller #Suspense #MustWatch #recommended #adventurous #bingewatch

Movie Recommendation of the Month: US! 🎬This sinister movie is one of a kind and has really dark and creepy storyline. With it's unique plot, the movie keeps you engaged through out it's run time. The story starts when the Wilson family goes out for a vacation at the beach. They are vigorously attacked by a group of mysterious figures dressed in red. Upon closer inspection, the Wilsons realise that the intruders are exact lookalikes of their family. The brilliant screenplay and the horrifying acting successfully creates a chilly atmosphere which is sure to give you goosebumps from time to time. The story turns dark with each passing moment and the ending is just out of the world.The viewers are forced to use their imagination to come up with an explanation about this really messy and confusing situation in which our protagonist is stuck.So, if you want to have a fascinating day then this story full of suspense, horror and thrill is the go to movie for you.#ThePageTurnerSociety #JIIT #PTS #Movie #US #MovieLove #Thriller #Suspense #watch #movietime #hollywood #hollywoodmovies #horror #usmovie

When it comes to suspense and thriller fiction there are very few names that one can trust and also it is found that almost 47% of the adults read fiction and every 1 of 10 books published is fiction. Now this gives us a good idea about how many authors are there in this field making it one of the most difficult tasks to pick up the author of the month in the area of suspense and thriller fiction. After reading the books of one of such quickly rising authors we found him - "Blake Crouch".Yes people we have chosen Blake as our Author of the Month and rightly so as his books have already been adapted into TV series and currently his book Dark Matter is being picturized by Sony Pictures. Blake started his career with 2 novels in 2004 and 2005 but what established him as a mystery author was his Wayward Pines Trilogy in 2012-14. Coming to his writing style, he is one of the best handlers of built-ups in books. When you start reading him, the beginning won't make sense but what would will amaze is you won't be able to keep Blake's book down and turns out it is the case all around the world. He weaves the story with such sophistication that the  person reading it is attached to it. They say- "The historian records, but the novelist creates" and trust us this what this author creates is worth recording. (as also proven by Sony Pictures and FOX 😝)Find out some of his books in the link in bio! Also let us know your favorite suspense thriller author in the comments... 😁#PageTurnerSociety #Books #JIIT #PTS #ThePageTurnerSociety #Thriller #Suspense #DarkMatter #Recursion #WaywardPines #BlakeCrouch #Readers #LoveToRead #LoveForReading #suspensebooks #Books #HappyReading

A book in the genre of Suspense and Thriller has to pass certain quality checks and we made sure that this time our Book of the month not only passed those but set the bar quite high up. Let me ask you this :Are You Happy With Your Life?? Whatever your answer might be, it is assured that this book, DARK MATTER by Blake Crouch, will make you happy not just because it a real pageturner but it does answer the question posed by Robert Frost in The Road not Taken.This book has a tinge of everything with loads and loads of thrill and it surely reminds us of Dan Brown. The story revolves around the protagonist, a physics professor, who one day wakes up in a world where he is not an ordinary man. He is to identify if that's a dream or some other reality of his world and must find his way back to his wife and son. We all are aware of the great thrillers written by S. Sheldon, Agatha Christie, or Lee Child but it has been long since a new style from a budding author came out that had everyone glued to it and kept those pages turning by themselves till there were no more to go on. This book clearly peeks into the future and gives a sight of what could be on the other side of world-changing technology and all this with a nailbiting end.#PageTurnerSociety #Books #JIIT #PTS #ThePageTurnerSociety #DarkMatter #BlakeCrouch #LoveToRead #LoveForReading #BooksForever #BooksForever #Thriller #BookOfTheMonth

Anime Recommendation of the Month: ClannadIn this time when everyone is looking for a story to feel that romantic touch, The Page Turner Society brings to you an unexpected but conventional love story about love and affection. Tomoya Okazaki a high school teenager is living a dull life . He thinks that no one can fill his void, that empty world he has been living in since his childhood. Here enters a character full of happiness, a lovely girl Nagisa Furukawa. Tough being full of lively spirit, she had to spend some time away from school and had to start over. Nagisa loves theatre and is a great performer. During an epic performance at the local festival Tomoya and Nagisa fall in love instantly. But soon the story takes an unexpected turn . A twist that will fill your heart with many emotions. A twist that will teach you about the hardships of love.Overall this sweet anime series is full of friendship, laughter, love and romance.#ThePageTurnerSociety #JIIT #PTS #Anime #AnimeLove #animeforever #clannad #Reading #clannadanime #clannadafterstory

We take immense pleasure in presenting you the winning poem for Right Writes, February EditionAll heart wants is a beautiful place to get lost. A beautiful spot , maybe on a yacht. All heart wants is to answer the call from the hills. To complete the hardest summits and get those satisfying chills. To experience the sun giving nature it's daily refills. All heart wants is to play with the waves,trying to catch one and let the other slip away. To explore the mystery inside the caves , searching for the inner self and giving negativity a castaway. All the heart wants is a cabin by the lake, with the heartthrob by your side giving you the sweet headache. All the heart wants is to travel to a thousand strange places, to extract the very essence of nature and all it's beautiful faces. But, what the heart wants the most is to keep the beauty alive, to carry the beautiful spot wherever it takes a dive.- Ishan, @__i.s.h.a.n_#PageTurnerSociety #Books #JIIT #PTS #Poems #CreativeWriting #LoveForWriting #LoveForReading #AllHeartWants

“What a treacherous thing to believe that a person is more than a person.”But when we talk about John Green YA novel Paper Towns we can be very much sure it is more than just a book. Paper Towns is the fourth novel by John Green in the Young Adult section and was the novel that established the writer in the section. It tells us the story of a boy believing in miracles but also knows that there is only for each person in the whole world. He finds his miracle, Margo Roth, living in front of his house and then losses it. Until one night the Margo climbs into his window. This is novel has everything, the famous girl, the awkward boy, the prom, thrill, yes it has a bit of thrill too, and of course a betraying and realistic ending. The only criticism this book has received is that it is a little similar to John Green's previous work "Looking for Alaska".If you haven't read that then you're good to go, and if you loved that then also you're going to love this.(Link to the book pdf in bio!) #PageTurnerSociety #Books #JIIT #PTS #PaperTowns #JohnGreen #Reading #LoveForReading #BooksForever

John Green the author who made us realize that love is not something which you do but something which you develop, the man who blessed the world of teenagers with a perfect definition of love with his novels let it be The fault in our star or Turtles all the way down. This month he has been chosen to be the author of the month rightly so Valentine's day is coming guys.When we look at his writing style we find a tinge of old-school perspective with a perfect blend of words to generate those goosebumps that one might actually feel when he/she is in love.He has been one of the best Young adult authors but the books written by him are very much on the top lists of not so Young adults XD. His novels cover multitudes and also tackle hard topics such as cancer, neurotic behaviors, depressions, and many more. Teenagers are able to connect with his characters and that too a variety of them. We have witnessed him write novels with a sad but terrific ending and what makes them a perfect hit is their touch with the world's reality. Well, it is impossible to condense all of his writing prowess in a single post so we will leave it at this by saying, as the world's teenagers say "John Green GETS IT".#ThePageTurnerSociety #Books #JIIT #PTS #JohnGreen #Author #PaperPlanes #FaultInOurStars #TurtlesAllTheWayDown #LookingForAlaska

This Republic day I salute my soldiers,For hauling the nation's load on their shoulders.I wonder what derives their vitality,In a nation full of corrupt people what motivates their integrity.I admire their strength to leave their family,So that ours can stay peacefully.I adore their love for the nation,As it is the purest of all relations.I cherish those mothers who have a heart so big,That they cede their sons to the nation,Instead of enforcing them to an ordinary gig,As they are the true worriers amongst the commotion.This country would be such a better place to live,If only all our concious was half as pure as the soldiers I believe.With this conviction in my heart,I pray thee, god Almighty, give my nation a new start.Poem by Dishita Sharma, @dishita_sharma_01 (Winner for Right Writes!)Page Turner Society wishes you a very Happy Republic Day! 🇮🇳🎉

Shambles!Just like Trafalgar Law, Sparsh is the strategist and surgeon of competitive programming! ⚔️ With a 5-star rank on CodeChef and the title of Expert on Codeforces, he slices through complex problems with precision and expertise. As an upcoming Software Engineer at Zomato, he’s ready to make waves in the tech world, just as Law navigates the seas! Whether it’s helping you master algorithms or guiding you through challenges, Sparsh’s guidance at Knuth Programming Hub is invaluable. Join us and learn from the best, as we push boundaries together!  @sparsh_rajput___
“There is a difference between you and me. We both looked into the abyss. But when it looked back at us, you blinked.” @shivamcy  Post Credits: @__yashii_singh__ @the.esoteric.girl @devyansh_05

Thrilled to announce that Ashish has been elected as a Coordinator for Knuth Programming Hub! 🎉 With his impressive achievements, including being a 4-star coder on CodeChef and a Specialist on CodeForces, Ashish brings a wealth of experience and passion to the role. His journey, which includes an upcoming internship at Google in 2025, is a testament to his dedication and skill in the world of programming.As he steps into this leadership position, we are confident that Ashish will drive innovation and inspire our community to reach new heights. Here’s to a future filled with exciting challenges and groundbreaking solutions under his guidance. Congratulations, Ashish, and welcome to this new chapter! 💻🚀 #KnuthHub #CodingExcellence #LeadershipInTech #futureofprogramming  @the_misanthrope_007  Post Credits : @__yashii_singh__  @devyansh_05 @the.esoteric.girl

Bhai Dooj in India marks a celebration of the sibling bond. Sisters pray for their brothers' well-being with a tikka and sweets, and in return, brothers vow to protect their sisters. It's a day that cherishes love and strengthens the sibling connection.Team Jhankaar wishes you all a happy Bhai Dooj!! May this bond of yours grow stronger with each passing year.

Choti Diwali marks the beginning of the Diwali celebrations, and many people start decorating their homes on this day to welcome the goddess Lakshmi, who is believed to bring wealth and prosperity. Just like Diwali, Choti Diwali is also associated with the lighting of lamps and candles. The Diyas are lit to symbolize the victory of light over darkness.  Embracing the warmth of Choti Diwali, where the glow of hope and the sparkle of joy light up our hearts. Team Jhankaar wishes you a very Happy Choti Diwali .

With just 11 days left for the most awaited event, excitement is at it's peak. So prepare yourself with your dance moves and Let the beat enter your soul and take over your body.Be ready to join us at ethnic night 2019 on 12th October.#EthnicNight #JIIT #Jhankaar

The navratri is one of the most ancient festivals dating back to the times immemorable. Navratri speaks about the great battle that took place between the powerful demon Mahishasura and Goddess Durga. It signifies the victory of good over evil.Team Jhankaar wishes you a very happy navratri! May you win over every evil that comes in your path to success.We wish the colour, bliss and beauty of this festival be with you through the year. Also, as the ETHNIC NIGHT is coming soon, keep your clothes on stand by, as it is not too far now.JAI MATA DI ❤️ #Navratri #Jhankaar #EthnicNight

Brace yourselves guys and girls, its the much awaited time of the year. Wrap yourself up in traditional attires as colorful as your soul and join the madness at the Ethnic Night'19 on the 12th of October at 5:00pm.So, come forward and dance your heart out and be lost in the beautiful cultural music we have that will stir each individual's soul and all you'll be left with would be warm memories which you may tend to discuss some day years after over a cup of tea❤️Seems old school, right?Stay tuned.#JIIT #EthnicNight #2019
After a strenuous interview session, we are delighted to present the Organising Committee for Ethnic Night 2019.Team Jhankaar wishes you all the best❤️

"Management is doing things right, leadership is doing the right things.". Jhankaar- the dance society of JIIT is back with the most awaited event of the college - ETHNIC NIGHT 2019. No event is successful without a good backstage team. Now it's your chance to show some of your skills and be a part of the grand event.The following are the five departments for which the first and second year students can fill the form:1) Management2) Marketing3) Public relations4) Creative5) DigitalThe last date to apply is 8th September, 2019 (Sunday). So hurry up!Form link in bio.

Gear up JIITians,𝐄𝐓𝐇𝐍𝐈𝐂 𝐍𝐈𝐆𝐇𝐓 𝐈𝐒 𝐂𝐎𝐌𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐒𝐎𝐎𝐍Sit tight for a night full of food, music, dance and good vibes 🧡Boys and Girls, pick out your traditional attires as its time to rock those kurtas and sarees.One of the most exhilarating nights of the semester is here! 🔥Details to be revealed soon.Turn on Post Notifications for more updates. #EthnicNight'19 #JIIT
Have love for dance? Wish to prove it? Express your love, tomorrow at 5 pm. Auditions for @surkhaabbhangra & @nrityang.

"Trust me you can Dance" - VodkaAfter an amazing orientation Now it's your chance. Pull up your socks and gear up because it's your turn to perform  and be the part of the family MMV, Western dance troupe of Jhankaar Fresher's don't miss the chance to join.Save the date 26th august at 5 pmPrepare a one minute long dance piece and bring your track in a pendrive.

ABCD- Any Body Can DanceYes, you! You can dance! Love bhangra or always had a fascination for classical dance? So, here is your chance to be a part of the very versatile teams - SURKHAAB (The bhangra troupe) and NRITYANG (The classical dance troupe)Haven't tried bhangra yet? Have no idea about classical? Don't worry because we are here to teach you first!Come and join the workshop of SURKHAAB and NRITYANG from 27th aug to 29 aug 2019 from 5:00 pm to 7:00 pm at OATFUN AWAITS!

Classical dance is the loftiest, the most moving, the most beautiful of the arts. For it is no mere translation or abstraction of life.With movements that capture the essence of the music and great technique matched with artistry, we present to you the COORDINATORS of Nrityang- the indian & classical dance society of JIIT.Congratulations ❤️

Bhangra, The Beat That Has the World dancing. Grooving with energy to the rhythmic beats and with expressions  so beautiful, they always make sure to put the stage on fire.Presenting to you the COORDINATORS of Surkhaab- the bhangra troupe of JIIT.Congratulations ❤️

Creativity is the common attributes between all artists yet what sets him apart is his ability to implement the whole creative teams effort into a beautiful masterpiece.With this we present CREATIVE HEAD of Jhankaar 2019-20,Harsh Mishra.Congratulations ❤️

This life does not ask you to stop, neither we will. WE will make it happen. With this we present to you MANAGEMENT HEAD Pratham Dhawan, who believes in supporting and walking shoulder to shoulder with the team.Congratulations ❤️

A team is made of individuals who are playing more than one role in their lives and still managing to give their best to the team."Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much"Presenting to you, MARKETING HEAD of Jhankaar 2019-20, Tanishka Tyagi, an apt example of dedication, commitment and perseverance.Congratulations ❤️

New sessions brings joy, new enthusiasm, a new start. It's all about working in a new way where belief and hardwork is the only key to achieve our targets.With this we present to you COORDINATOR 2019-20, Mayank Saxena, who believes in togetherness, working together and celebrating together.Congratulations ❤️

"A good leader leads the people from above them. A great leader leads people from within". She with her simple smile and benevolent nature can ease problems as and when they arise.With this we present to you the COORDINATOR of Jhankaar 2019-20, Anika Sindwani.Congratulations ❤️

Let’s embrace new challenges and celebrate our collective journey. 💪✨Looking forward to the future and the limitless possibilities ahead! 🚀🔥

IMPRESSIONS’24 AFTERMOVIE🎥✨Memories are the treasures we keep locked away within the storehouse of our souls. Reflecting on this year’s fest, our hearts overflow with gratitude and joy. Each moment was crafted with dedication, creativity, and the collective spirit of our amazing team. From the dazzling performances to the behind-the-scenes efforts, every detail spoke of our passion and unity. The laughter, camaraderie, and shared experiences truly defined the fest. Here’s to cherishing these beautiful memories and dreaming even bigger for the future...🎥 FROM TEAM JPEGEdited by @ig_harsh.it ..#fest #impressions #college #collegefest #aftetmovie #jpeg #jpegjiit #jiit

“Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success.” - Henry FordWe present to you JYC Core: a team bursting with zeal, ingenuity, and determination. Each member exemplifies dedication, creativity, and resilience, transforming challenges into opportunities. From humble beginnings, we’ve grown into a formidable force, driven by passion and relentless effort. Our journey from amateurs to experts is a testament to our commitment to excellence. With unwavering focus, we aim to uphold our positions and propel the JIIT Youth Club to new heights. Together, we are not just leaders; we are trailblazers, shaping a brighter future for all. 🌟✨Thrilled to have Ayush Swami, who will be serving as JYC Head for the tenure 2024-2025!❣️

With heartfelt gratitude, we bid farewell to our Senior Advisor, Rohit Kansal. 🌟 Throughout his years with us, Rohit has been a beacon of enthusiasm, dedication, and unwavering support. From his early days as a team member to his exceptional tenure as Finance Head, and finally, his role as Senior Advisor, he has exemplified excellence and commitment. 🚀 His relentless drive and passion have propelled our team to new heights and fostered a culture of collaboration and success. His leadership has been instrumental in orchestrating numerous successful events, leaving an indelible mark on our team. 🎉 We extend our deepest thanks to Rohit Sir for his unparalleled contributions and wish him the very best in his future endeavors. 🙌✨

🎉 With immense appreciation, we bid farewell to our Senior Advisor and former Digital Head, Shivam Gupta! 🚀 Your unparalleled talent in crafting graphically stunning posts and captivating videos has transformed our digital presence. From ideation to execution, your swift and accurate output never ceased to amaze us. Your work has not only grabbed attention but also setting standards  in digital expression. Thank you, Shivam Sir, for being the creative backbone of JYC, always delivering top-notch results in record time. Wishing you the very best in your future adventures! 🌟✨

🌟 As we bid a heartfelt farewell to our  Senior Advisor, Atul Sharma, we reflect on his incredible journey with JYC. With unparalleled convincing skills and a natural knack for coordination and synchronization, He ensured every event was flawlessly organized, often with spontaneous brilliance. His tenure as Internal Affairs Head showcased his invaluable connections, benefiting JYC in countless ways. Thank you, Atul Sir, for being a consistently active team member, a dedicated leader, and a wise advisor. Wishing you all the best in your future endeavors! 🙌🎉

"Life is a journey, and every journey has a destination. As you embark on this new adventure, may your path be smooth, your burdens light, and your goals in sight."As your time with us draws to a close, we wanted to take a moment to let you know that we are organizing a special farewell event to celebrate your achievements and say goodbye in a fitting way.We understand that this is an emotional time for everyone, and we want to create an atmosphere that honors your hard work, dedication, and achievements. Holi, also known as the 'festival of colors,' is a time to cherish relationships, forgive mistakes, and rekindle friendships. It's a day when social barriers are broken, and people of all ages, genders, and religions come together to share joy and happiness.After a gap of almost two years due to the Covid-19 pandemic, we are now celebrating Holi, and it's imperative that we celebrate it safely and responsibly. Let's choose eco-friendly colours to add vibrancy to our lives and make a conscious effort to let go of negativity and grudges by burning them in the Holika fire.Let us also remember to spread positivity and kindness in our communities and be responsible and respect the boundaries and wishes of others.On behalf of the JYC team, we wish you a very joyful and colourful Holi! Let this festival bring you and your loved ones closer and fill your lives with love, happiness, and prosperity.

ॐ तत्पुरुषाय विद्महे महादेवाय धीमहि।तन्नो रुद्रः प्रचोदयात॥🔱Shivaratri means Shiva’s night. It is mainly because Shiva is traditionally associated with Tamas, which represents night or darkness. Shiva is their source, but he does not have them. He is Shivam, means the purest. The darkness of tamas cannot reside in him, but he presides over it as its controller and lord. Thus, Shivaratri, or the night of Shiva, has symbolic significance. Shiva is the lord of the materiality of the universe. In the microcosm of a living being, he is the lord of the mind and body. Both are enveloped in darkness.Happy Maha Shivaratri 🔱

"Every Indian should now forget that he is a Rajput, a Sikh or a Jat. He must remember that he is an Indian." - Sardar PatelRepublic Day signifies the right spirit of Independent and individual India. The important symbols of the festival include the exhibition of military equipment, the national flag and military equipment.Our Indian Constitution lays down fundamental rights of the citizens of India, irrespective of their political beliefs. It also lays down a few fundamental duties for all the citizens of India to abide by.According to the Constitution of India, “It proclaims India a sovereign, liberal, secular, elected republic nation assuring its citizens of fair justice, equality, and freedom and efforts to support fraternity among them.”On this day let us make a promise to strive for justice, freedom and equal rights for every Indian and for peace and unity among all who are fortunate enough to live in this glorious nation. Wish you a very Happy Republic Day!🇮🇳

It is considered pretty important by many as it signifies the beginning. New Year is not just about celebrations and resolutions; it is more than what meets the eye.  It symbolizes motivation for many new beginnings.We wish you a better year with new opportunities and beautiful moments.Happy New Year ✨✨✨

It is with heavy hearts that we share the news of the passing of Bhavy Tripathi, a cherished member of our JPEG family. Bhavy's light, creativity, and passion for photography were truly unmatched. He had a unique way of capturing the world, and his work left a lasting impact on all of us. Beyond his incredible talent, Bhavy was a kind and inspiring presence, always lifting the spirits of those around him. Our thoughts and prayers are with his family and friends during this incredibly difficult time. Rest in peace, Bhavy. Your legacy will live on in every photo you took and every life you touched.

Rules for PIXEL'23 📢📢📢Stay tuned for more information

-Pixel is an exciting online photography competition that provides a platform for photographers of all levels to showcase their skills and creativity.•Participants will be given a theme on the day of the event .Participants can interpret the theme in any way they choose, using their own unique vision and style to capture moments through their camera lens.•Participants have to submit only their original work. They are allowed to edit the photos but have to submit both the raws and the edit for authenticity of the work.•Entries to Pixel are judged on the basis of the technical and creative aspects of the photographs. The judges assess the quality, composition, lighting, and storytelling of the images to determine the winner. CASH PRIZE 🏆 : 5KBest of luck enthusiasts 🤩

𝐌𝐫. & 𝐌𝐬. 𝐏𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐨𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐜~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Mr. and Ms. Photogenic competition is a highly anticipated event that celebrates the beauty and charisma of individuals through the art of photography. This competition is designed to showcase the contestants' ability to present themselves in front of the camera and capture their essence in a single snapshot 📸•NOTE : During the competition, contestants are required to participate in a photo shoot session where they are photographed in outfits and poses of their choosing on a photo booth setup in front of the annapurna . The photographs are then reviewed by a panel of judges who evaluate the quality and creativity of the photos, as well as the contestants' ability to project their personalities and engage with the camera..COMPETITION HAS A CASH PRIZE OF ₹5k💰BEST OF LUCK PARTICIPANTS 👍🏻

Gear up as the Jaypee Photo Enthusiasts Guild(JPEG) brings to you an Online Photography Competition - PIKSELThe themes are as follows - “Night Lights”,“Pattern/Pattern Breaking” and“Photojournalism Through B&W”. Round 1:~ All the submissions in this event is through social media.~ Entries will be posted on various pages of the society and will be given great exposure. ~ Judging panel that will decide the best few entries. The criteria will be 60% photography aspects and relation to thetheme and 40% voting.Round 2:~ Top 40 best entries will be framed and displayed near Cafeteria on both days of the fest. Well known photography experts are invited as judges to judge the displayed photos. Their decision will be final and irrevocable.You can submit 1 photograph per theme. Maximum of 3 photographs for 3 different themes.Don’t shoot what it looks like. Shoot what it feels like before the deadlines approach. The last date for the submissions is 22nd February 2018.You can mail the entries at jiitjpeg123@gmail.com along with your full name, college name and contact no. The subject of the mail must be the theme name.You can even fill the form through the QR code and submit your entries.Form link: https://goo.gl/formsORwbZZZL0sRHtDkR2

Are you a picture addict? Love posing and being clicked? Well, no more of getting jealous of your friends' professional photoshoots. Here's your chance to revamp your Instagram walls, pose in all your favourite ways and get clicked by some of the most talented photographers in town!Jaypee Photo Enthusiasts Guild(JPEG), the film photography hub of JIIT, brings to you an opportunity to be grabbed by both hands. We invite you all for "Walk in photoshoot" wherein you'll be in focus flaunting your poses blended with a tinge of elegance.So be there dressed in the best way you can.Date: 2nd AugustTime: After the JPEG orientationVenue: In front of OAT.Come one, come all. It's going to be fun!
